definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
Foxconn Technology Group/abbr. of 富士康科技集團|富士康科技集团[Fu4 shi4 kang1 ke1 ji4 ji2 tuan2]

pinyin: Fu4 shi4 kang1 Ke1 ji4 Ji2 tuan2

sentences.english: The wedding will be held at Fuji Mount in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼将会在日本富士山举行。

sentences.english: 'Our goal remains to be No. 1, ' said Mr. Saso, the Fujitsu executive.
sentences.chinese: 富士通的佐相秀幸说，我们的目标是全世界第一。

sentences.english: Would we recommend climbing Mount Fuji to friends?
sentences.chinese: 我们会向朋友介绍攀登富士山吗？

sentences.english: The snow peaked Fujiyama is the trademark of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 积雪盖顶的富士山是日本的标志。

sentences.english: Japan's Mount Fuji, covered with snow, stands amidst the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 日本富士山，山峰高耸入云，山巅白雪皑皑。

sentences.english: Foxconn did not go into the details surrounding Sun's death.
sentences.chinese: 富士康没有对孙的死亡做详细的解释。

sentences.english: SOMETHING is brewing under Japan's Mount Fuji.
sentences.chinese: 日本富士山的下面似乎正在酝酿着什么。

sentences.english: That leaves in Fuji series starring this is the first time.
sentences.chinese: 相叶在富士的连续剧主演这次是第一次。

sentences.english: Japan's Mount Fuji, seen from an airplane, was covered with snow and surrounded by clouds Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 从飞机上俯瞰被积雪和云层覆盖的日本富士山。

sentences.english: It depends on how Foxconn and Apple work with the loc's government.
sentences.chinese: 其依赖于富士康和苹果公司如何与当地政府互助。

sentences.english: Adventitious buds regeneration from etiolated internode segment of apple cultivar Nagafu No.
sentences.chinese: 富士苹果黄化茎段再生不定芽的研究。

sentences.english: Early the next morning, some Japanese families climb Mount Fuji.
sentences.chinese: 第二天清晨，有些日本家庭会爬富士山。

sentences.english: Japan's Mount Fuji, seen from an airplane, was covered with snow and surrounded.
sentences.chinese: 从飞机上俯瞰被积雪和云层覆盖的日本富士山。

sentences.english: Soneva Fushi, for instance, will become the world's first carbon-neutral tourist resort.
sentences.chinese: 例如富士公司，将成为世界上第一个碳中性旅游胜地。

sentences.english: Red Fuji apples cost $2 apiece in Japan compared with 90 cents in the U.S., according to the same sources.
sentences.chinese: 红富士苹果一个就要2美元，在美国只要90美分。

definition: Olympus, Japanese manufacturer of cameras and optical instruments
Ricoh, Japanese imaging and electronics company
film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
milkshake (Note: 昔[xi1] is loaned from English "shake" via Cantonese 昔, pr. sik1)
